DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Nebido Bone Mineral Density ( BMD ) Hypogonadal Paraplegic Patients With Confirmed Osteoporosis
DOC.criteria: Male patient > 18yrs Osteoporosis prophylaxis/therapy vitamin D 800 1200 mg per day , calcium 800 1000 mg per day , Fosamax 70 week . Standardised physiotherapy exercise programme . No proliferative bone disease . No history calcium oxalate stone . No use aromatase inhibitor . No use 5alpha reductase inhibitor .
